meanings.definition: Covered in a shiny or slippery substance
meanings.sent1: The glairiest fish in the pond slipped out of my hands.
meanings.sent2: Her glairiest shoes sparkled under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The glairiest banana peel caused a comical slip on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The glairiest ice on the road made driving treacherous.
meanings.sent5: The glairiest gem in the collection caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: Having a glossy or lustrous appearance
meanings.sent1: The glairiest car in the showroom gleamed with perfection.
meanings.sent2: She wore the glairiest lipstick for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The glairiest painting in the gallery seemed to glow mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: Her glairiest smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The glairiest marble statue stood out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Showing a high degree of glare or brightness
meanings.sent1: The glairiest light bulb in the room was blinding.
meanings.sent2: The glairiest sunbeam shone through the window.
meanings.sent3: The glairiest disco ball at the party made everyone dance enthusiastically.
meanings.sent4: Her glairiest idea illuminated the entire project.
meanings.sent5: The glairiest fireworks lit up the night sky with colors.
